verses.verse: The <S%H410>Mighty<s%> <S%H430>One,<s%> God, <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H1696>speaks,<s%> and <S%H7121>calls<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8121>from<s%> <S%H4217>sunrise<s%> to <S%H3996>sunset.<s%>
Out of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> the <S%H4359>perfection<s%> of <S%H3308>beauty,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> shines <S%H3313>forth.<s%>

Our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> and does not keep <S%H2790>silent.<s%> A <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devours<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3966>him.<s%> It is very <S%H8175>stormy<s%> around <S%H5439>him.<s%>
He <S%H7121>calls<s%> to the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H5920>above,<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that he may <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people:<s%>
<S%H622>"Gather<s%> my <S%H2623>saints<s%> together to <S%H3772>me,<s%> those who have made a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with me by <S%H2077>sacrifice.<s%>"
The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> himself is <S%H8199>judge.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H8085>"Hear,<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will <S%H1696>speak;<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and I will <S%H1696>testify<s%> against <S%H430>you.<s%> I am God, your <S%H430>God.<s%>
I <S%H3198>don't<s%> rebuke you for your <S%H2077>sacrifices.<s%> Your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> are continually before <S%H8548>me.<s%>
I have no <S%H3947>need<s%> for a <S%H6499>bull<s%> from your <S%H1004>stall,<s%> nor male <S%H6260>goats<s%> from your <S%H4356>pens.<s%>
For every <S%H2416>animal<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> is <S%H929>mine,<s%> and the livestock on a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2042>hills.<s%>
I <S%H3045>know<s%> all the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%> The wild <S%H2123>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> are <S%H5978>mine.<s%>
If I were <S%H7456>hungry,<s%> I would not <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H8398>you,<s%> for the world is <S%H4393>mine,<s%> and all that is in it.
Will I <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H47>bulls,<s%> or <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6260>goats?<s%>
<S%H2076>Offer<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> the sacrifice of <S%H8426>thanksgiving.<s%> <S%H7999>Pay<s%> your <S%H5088>vows<s%> to the Most <S%H5945>High.<s%>
<S%H7121>Call<s%> on me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%> I will <S%H2502>deliver<s%> <S%H3513>you,<s%> and you will honor me."

But to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> "What right do you have to <S%H5608>declare<s%> my <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> that you have <S%H5375>taken<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> on your <S%H6310>lips,<s%>
since you <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> and <S%H7993>throw<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> behind <S%H310>you?<s%>
When you <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H1590>thief,<s%> you <S%H7521>consented<s%> with <S%H2506>him,<s%> and have participated with <S%H5003>adulterers.<s%>
"You <S%H7971>give<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H7451>evil.<s%> Your <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H6775>frames<s%> <S%H4820>deceit.<s%>
You <S%H3427>sit<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> against your <S%H251>brother.<s%> <S%H5414>You<s%> <S%H1848>slander<s%> your own <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1121>son.<s%>

You have <S%H6213>done<s%> these <S%H2790>things,<s%> and I kept silent. You <S%H1819>thought<s%> that I was <S%H1961>just<s%> like <S%H3198>you.<s%> I will rebuke <S%H6186>you,<s%> and accuse you in front of your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
"Now <S%H995>consider<s%> <S%H7911>this,<s%> you who forget <S%H433>God,<s%> lest I tear you into <S%H2963>pieces,<s%> and there be none to <S%H5337>deliver.<s%>

Whoever <S%H2076>offers<s%> the sacrifice of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> <S%H3513>glorifies<s%> <S%H7760>me,<s%> and prepares his <S%H1870>way<s%> so that I will <S%H7200>show<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>'s salvation to <S%H3468>him.<s%>"
